name: Running Vs Chat
description:
In Running Vs Chat, the Twitch Chat is in control of placing obstacles and platforms, and the streamer has to run the gauntlet and survive for as long as possible. Who will get the glory of being the one to stop the streamer?

On top of that, there's a whole range of different surprises that Chat can unleash upon the streamer. Some are cute, some are distracting and some just makes the run a lot harder. Who knows what might happen?

For non-streamers, there's also an Offline Mode where you can test out what it'll be like for the streamer playing, where an AI will try to replicate the chat. Or you can look at this playthrough of version 0.7 by the streamer Phenexa.

Game Creation: kevdk - @CasperFFarsoe on Twitter

Art: bevouliin.com

Made in Unity.
